<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}

  context={"endpoint"}

Request for a base64-encoded unsigned Universal Send transaction

:::note
- Refer to [Send API doc](/docs/universal-send-api) for more information
:::


<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"type":"object","required":["invitePDA","sender"],"properties":{"invitePDA":{"type":"string","description":"- Program Derived Address derived by `\"invite\"` and the public key of the invite\n- Do note that, the invitePDA requires to be generated client side, [refer to docs](/docs/universal-send-api)\n- Please handle invite code and secret key with highest security as user funds are involved\n"},"sender":{"type":"string","description":"- Public key address of the sender\n- Since this address funded the invite, it will be the receiving address of the full amount\n"}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Successful response","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["tx"],"properties":{"tx":{"type":"string","description":"- Base64-encoded unsigned Universal Send transaction\n"}}}}}},"400":{"description":"Bad request body","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"error":{"type":"string"}},"required":["error"]}}}},"500":{"description":"Internal error","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"error":{"type":"string"}},"required":["error"]}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
